data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Cartago, Costa Rica need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cartago, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Cartago, Costa Rica honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Cartago.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Cartago, Costa Rica that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, encourage the 90,061 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 90,061 believers in the state of Cartago the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Cartago
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Cartago
location.cities_list: Paraíso, Turrialba, Cartago, San Diego, Concepción
location.cities_list_w_pop: Paraíso (39,702), Turrialba (28,955), Cartago (26,594), San Diego (16,991), Concepción (14,000)
